means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Burundi
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Burundi or its people;

auth_sentence.content: Joanna, a young Burundian restaurateur, has had difficulties with construction.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Joanna, a young Burundian restaurateur, has had difficulties with construction.

auth_sentence.content: Burundian immigration officials have canceled the work permit of Human Rights Watch researcher Neela Ghoshal.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Burundian immigration officials have canceled the work permit of Human Rights Watch researcher Neela Ghoshal.

auth_sentence.content: Human Rights Watch says the move does not serve the interests of the Burundian people.
